addr: Westminster Bridge Road London, Gt Lon SE1 GB
title: SEA LIFE After Dark
desc: The famous SEA LIFE London Aquarium on London?s South Bank reopens after hours for an exclusive, adults-only, late night experience which allows you to encounter extraordinary marine life in all its glory.? Enjoy a themed reception drink on arrival and prepare yourself for passing over the Shark Walk, a glass walkway above our magnificent Pacific Reef display. Be warned - sharks will be swimming just inches from your feet!? As you make your way through the aquarium marvel at our two giant green sea turtles as you pass through the Ocean Tunnel; creep past our Cuban crocodile in our Rainforest area and find out just how many fish can be found in our very own river Thames! Our knowledgeable guest experience advisors will be stationed at various points throughout the venue so you can learn all about our creatures and find out more about all the conservation work we do.? Please note this event is for over 18s only and you may be requested to show your ID on the door. N.B please note the Penguins exhibition is not available during the After Dark event.
